channel.title: SRWare Iron Help
channel.description: Okay, so the other day I installed Iron to replace Chrome. My only issue with it is that all of the time it decides to not let me set it as the default browser no matter what I try.

item.title: SRWare Iron Help
item.dc:creator: Jingles
item.description:
Yes, it is exactly the same as Chrome, just more secure. The problem Russ was that it did not accept me clicking to set it as default. I managed to fix the problem anyway. I reran the installer as administrator. It then let me change the default settings/

Read full topic

item.title: SRWare Iron Help
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Wait, is the interface exactly the same as in Chrome? Because Wikipedia’s shortcuts sure make it out to be that way.

In that case, are the homepage settings not located in the same place?

Read full topic

item.title: SRWare Iron Help
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
I’d never use a browser by a company that spells flexible as “flexiblel”.

https://www.srware.net/en/software_srware_iron_chrome_vs_iron.php

Read full topic
